title: #146: 5 Truths for Love Addicts Healing from Heartbreak
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Heartbreak is really hard for love addicts. Especially when we're still holding on. This episode is to give 5 truths for love addicts healing for heartbreak.  RESOURCES MENTIONED  Join our weekly text inspiration list by texting PODCAST to...
itunes:summary:
Heartbreak is really hard for love addicts. Especially when we're still holding on. This episode is to give 5 truths for love addicts healing for heartbreak.

Click here to register for our next open house for The Recovery School
